location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2795 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jonesâ€™s earlier letter (folios 190-91) relating to measures to check the slave trade from East Africa. Anderson writes that Government approves of his proceedings, and that the Commander-in-Chief of the Indian Navy has been requested to despatch a steamer to patrol the Arabian coast.
